trans-unit.source: Provides host for workflow-based services.
trans-unit.target: 为基于工作流的服务提供主机。

trans-unit.source: Implements the host used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] service model programming model.
trans-unit.target: 实现 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服务模型编程模型所使用的主机。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> class to configure and expose a workflow as service for use by client applications when you are not using Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Activation Services (WAS) to expose a service.
trans-unit.target: 当您没有使用 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 或 Windows 激活服务 (WAS) 公开服务时，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 类来配置和公开工作流作为服务以供客户端应用程序使用。

trans-unit.source: Both IIS and WAS interact with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> object on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: IIS 和 WAS 均代表您与 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 对象交互。

trans-unit.source: To expose a workflow as service for use by callers, WCF requires a complete service description (represented by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> class).
trans-unit.target: 若要公开工作流作为服务以供调用方使用，WCF 需要完整的服务说明（由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> 类表示）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> class creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription> from the workflow service type and configuration information and then uses that description to create <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> objects for each endpoint in the description.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 类根据工作流服务类型和配置信息创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription>，然后再使用该说明为说明中的每个终结点创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> object to load a workflow service, configure endpoints, apply security settings, and start listeners to handle incoming requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 对象可加载工作流服务、配置终结点、应用安全设置并启动侦听器来处理传入的请求。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流定义的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 类型的数组，包含承载服务的基址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a byte stream that contains the workflow definition and the base addresses of the service specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用包含工作流定义的字节流和指定的服务基址初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload if the workflow definition is stored in secured storage, such as a database.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流定义存储在安全存储（如数据库）中，请使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the workflow definition file.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含工作流定义文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 类型的数组，包含承载服务的基址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a path to the workflow definition and the base addresses of the service specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作流定义的路径和指定的服务基址初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the workflow definition is in the form of windows file.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流定义采用 Windows 文件形式时，请使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流实例的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 类型的数组，包含承载服务的基址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a workflow type and the base addresses of the service specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作流类型和指定的服务基址初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the workflow is defined as compiled type.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流定义为已编译类型时，请使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流定义的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow rules definition.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流规则定义的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 类型的数组，包含承载服务的基址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a byte stream that contains the workflow definition, a byte stream that contains the workflow rules definition, and the base addresses of the service specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用包含工作流定义的字节流、包含工作流规则定义的字节流和指定的服务基址初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the workflow definition and rules definition are stored in secured storage, such as a database.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流定义和规则定义存储在安全存储（如数据库）中时，请使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the workflow definition file.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含工作流定义文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the workflow rules definition file.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含工作流规则定义文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 类型的数组，包含承载服务的基址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a path to the workflow definition, a path to the workflow rules definition, and the base addresses of the service specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作流定义的路径、工作流规则定义的路径和指定的服务基址初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the workflow definition and rules definition are in the form of windows files.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流定义和规则定义采用 Windows 文件形式时，请使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流定义的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that contains the workflow rules definition.
trans-unit.target: 包含工作流规则定义的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: A type provider that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> 接口的类型提供程序。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 类型的数组，包含承载服务的基址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a byte stream that contains the workflow definition, a byte stream that contains the workflow rules definition, a type provider for custom activity types, and the base addresses of the service specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用包含工作流定义的字节流、包含工作流规则定义的字节流、自定义活动类型的类型提供程序和指定的服务基址初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when your compiled workflow references custom types defined in a separate assembly.
trans-unit.target: 当已编译的工作流引用在单独的程序集中定义的自定义类型时，请使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the workflow definition file.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含工作流定义文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the workflow rules definition file.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含工作流规则定义文件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A type provider that implements the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> 接口的类型提供程序。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 类型的数组，包含承载服务的基址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> class using a path to the workflow definition, a path to the workflow rules definition, a type provider for custom activity types, and the base addresses of the service specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作流定义的路径、工作流规则定义的路径、自定义活动类型的类型提供程序和指定的服务基址初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when you have your workflow defined in a workflow markup file (.xoml) and it references custom types defined in a separate assembly.
trans-unit.target: 当在工作流标记文件 (.xoml) 中定义工作流并且该工作流引用单独的程序集中定义的自定义类型时，请使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the hosted service.
trans-unit.target: 将服务终结点添加到承载服务中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的地址。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint for the workflow service using the specified contract, binding, and endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的协定、绑定和终结点地址为工作流服务添加服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> added to the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 添加到工作流服务的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow service does not implement <paramref name="implementedContract" />.
trans-unit.target: 工作流服务不实现 <paramref name="implementedContract" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 包含所添加终结点地址的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the workflow service with a specified contract, binding, and URI that contains the endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的约定、绑定和包含终结点地址的 URI 将服务终结点添加到工作流服务中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> added to the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 添加到工作流服务的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The workflow service does not implement <paramref name="implementedContract" />.
trans-unit.target: 工作流服务不实现 <paramref name="implementedContract" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint address for the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> on which the service endpoints can listen.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点可在其上侦听的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the workflow service with a specified contract, a binding, an endpoint address, and a URI on which the service listens.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的协定、绑定和终结点地址以及服务在其上侦听的 URI 将服务终结点添加到工作流服务中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> added to the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 添加到工作流服务的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute" /> not specified for <paramref name="implementedContract" />.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute" /> 指定 <paramref name="implementedContract" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 所添加终结点的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the address for the endpoint added.
trans-unit.target: 包含所添加终结点地址的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> on which the service endpoints can listen.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点可在其上侦听的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a service endpoint to the workflow service with a specified contract, a binding, a URI that contains the endpoint address, and a URI on which the service listens.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的协定、绑定、包含终结点地址的 URI 以及服务在其上侦听的 URI 将服务终结点添加到工作流服务中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> added to the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 添加到工作流服务的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute" /> not specified for <paramref name="implementedContract" />.
trans-unit.target: 没有为 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute" /> 指定 <paramref name="implementedContract" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object contains the keyed-contracts of the hosted service that have been implemented.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法返回时，<see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> 对象将包含已实现的承载服务的键控协定。

trans-unit.source: Creates a description of the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 创建工作流服务的说明。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" /> of the workflow service.
trans-unit.target: 工作流服务的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> is put into a closing state.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> 进入关闭状态前调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: In the default implementation, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> before calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.OnClosing%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在默认实现中，<xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> 将在调用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.StopRuntime%2A> 之前调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.OnClosing%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This means the workflow runtime will shut down before the service host closes.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着工作流运行时将在服务主机关闭前关闭。
